front.title: Transmission of IPv6, IPv4 and ARP Packets over Fibre Channel

abstract.t: This document specifies the way of encapsulating IPv6, IPv4 and ARP packets over Fibre Channel. This document specifies also the method of forming IPv6 link-local addresses and statelessly autoconfigured IPv6 addresses on Fibre Channel networks, and a mechanism to perform IPv4 address resolution over Fibre Channel networks.
